details:
verb
- to make payment to
= example: to make payment to
= synonyms: recompense
- to make amends for
= example: to make amends for
= synonyms: recompense
- to do or give something to somebody in return
= synonyms: pay
- to make reparations or amends for
= example: to make reparations or amends for
= synonyms: redress
- to adjust for
= synonyms: correct
- to make up for shortcomings or a feeling of inferiority by exaggerating good qualities
= synonyms: cover
